t: Kat Von D Has Stepped Down as the Owner of Kat Von D Beauty
s: January 16, 2020 - Kat Von D announced on January 16 that she is stepping down as the owner of Kat Von D, effective immediately. The beauty brand is changing its name to KVD Vegan Beauty and will maintain operations, with Kendo as its sole owners.
